very-good.text: Wow,/ I think you killed it!/ You have some real talent.

good.text: Hey,/ that was pretty good!/ And y'know,/ with a little more training you'll get even better.

very-bad.text: Well./././ I wouldn't eat it. Did you have any cooking experience before this?
Uhh I mean like,/ Richie's been helping me figure out the kitchen stuff./ ./././Did I mess something up?

sensei-answers-praise.text: Hmm./ Yes!/ Pretty good./ Your rhythm's ahhh./././ a little off though!
Yes! That food should be coming out like pap-/pap-/pap-/pap-/pap!/ Right now you're more like pappap,// pappa/ pap.
You don't want to give them any break./ Eating should become an unconscious reflex to them,/ like blinking!/

sensei-answers-insult.text: What I think #player# is trying to say is your rhythm is ahhh./././ a little off.
Yes! That food should be coming out like pap-/pap-/pap-/pap-/pap!/ Right now you're more like pappap,// pappa/ pap.
You don't want to give them a break./ Eating should become an unconscious reflex to them,/ like blinking!

oh-okay.text: Hey hey!/ Don't worry,/ we'll work on that./ Good work everybody!
#sensei#,/ #player# -/-/ see what you can do to drum up more business!
We'll be here when you feel like training us up again./ No hurry!
